p: Calu-3 cells were cultured at the indicated concentrations with either DMSO as the solvent, oseltamivir or itraconazole for 24 h. Subsequently, MTT 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide was added for 4 h, and cell viability was evaluated via OD562 measurements according to the manufacturer’s protocols (Sigma, Darmstadt, Germany). The microbial alkaloid staurosporine (1 µM, Sigma, Darmstadt, Germany) was used to induce cell death.
